name: Tech Innovators Meetup
description: A gathering of developers, entrepreneurs, and tech enthusiasts to discuss the latest in technology and innovation.

name: Urban Art Festival
description: Experience a vibrant celebration of contemporary urban art, featuring graffiti, installations, and live performances.

name: Summer Beats Concert
description: A high-energy concert featuring popular bands and solo artists to kick off the summer vibe.

name: National Hackathon 2025
description: A nationwide coding challenge bringing together developers to solve real-world problems using technology.

name: Handcraft Expo
description: Explore and shop a variety of handmade goods by local artisans, including pottery, jewelry, and home decor.

name: International Film Festival
description: A showcase of international and local films, celebrating diverse storytelling through cinema.
